A bill to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard, and for other purposes.
Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Thune with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 115-89.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 112.
